verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Upokee Baba sadaka tunaleta,
upokee Baba vipaji vyetu x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Ni shukrani zetu, kwako Mungu
wetu (sisi) twasema asante
kwako Mungu wetu,
kwa Baraka zako na neema
nyingi (hivyo) twasema asante
kwako Mungu wetu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ni sadaka safi tunakutolea,
tunajitolea nazo nafsi zetu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kazi ya mikono yetu wanadamu,
mazao ya mashamba tunakutolea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Baba naleta na mifugo yetu,
tunakushukuru twasema asante.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Twaja mbele zako tukinesanesa,
twaushanglia utukufu wako.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Tunajikabidhi kwako Bwana Mungu,
utusimamie maishani mwetu.
